name: Storage Bags
pages: Bags allows you to quickly collect unstackable items in your inventory. There are 2 kinds: Equipment bags collecting everything that has durability, and book bags collecting enchantment books.$(br2)Bags can store up to 64 items, but they don't have GUIs. To get items out of the bags, you have to dump everything out.

pages.text: Features:$(li)Bag Collect: Right click to store matching items in inventory, other than hotbar.$(li)Bag Extract: Shift + right click to throw out all stored items.$(li)$(l:mechanics/chest)Load / Dump with Chest$(/l)
